Vör

A new kind of
smart office experience.
by Futurice.

  • Tell Me More

By Vör be cleansed,
darkness return, to darkness below

It is an open source tool that creates a seamless connection between people within the office space
and informs about current happening around. Here and Now is the core behind Vör.
Information like temperature, workspace availability, people around and much more is what Vor knows.

Behold the icons that visualize what you’re all about. or just take up space. your call bro.
